title: Help with painting color / Reference images
body:
Hey guys,

I was talking to player support and they pointed me out you here to speak to the devs, I was hoping that I could pick your brain on some reference images. I wanted to paint all the figures, but I don't have any great reference photo's, do you have any images that would help me get a better color match?

I've linked an image of my first attempts on 5 testers, they need some touch ups, and I'm going to change the shield and armor color, but these could look really nice once I've finished them.
http://imgur.com/Ecf9CSx

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Jas

replies.body:
We actually tried our hand at painting some of the pre-production minions and this is what we came up with. Keep in mind though that these are on unwashed minions (the final minions have a slight wash).

http://imgur.com/a/IeotJ

There's also a [thread about painting minions](https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/1710110/painting-tutorial-minions) over on bgg with techniques and such.

https://youtu.be/XlwTFwc8a6Y

I think you should consider using a color wheel and generally choose colors that complement on it. You can go with the in game colors or use your imagination. I hope this helps.
